articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Kim Dae Jung
     Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary  Kim Jong Il received a gift from President Kim Dae Jung during his visit to Pyongyang for historic Pyongyang meeting and north-south summit talks.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Kim Dae Jung and his wife
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Kim Dae Jung and his wife
      Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- General Secretary  Kim Jong Il was presented with a pair of Jindo hounds, a famous breed in South Korea, by President Kim Dae Jung and his wife during their visit to Pyongyang for historic Pyongyang meeting and the north-south summit talks.
